channel.title: Python on Ezekiel Haggart
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Ezekiel Haggart

item.title: 2018 Current Projects
item.description: Looking ahead at the year I wanted to write down some projects I am working on to better hold myself accountable. This list will be updated periodically as the projects develop. NZ Wijn an ecommerce store I am currently building using Python django. This project will be up in running in the next month or two. Build a player skills profile app to develop my machine learning skills accross both R and Python.
